name: Blasteroids (itch) (Soko Interactive)
description:
Everyone loves asteroids. We added up-gradable weapons, missiles, astronauts, more UFOs, power-ups, health packs, shields, and so much more. Playable in browser.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move Spaceship
Mouse - Aim weapons
Left Click - Fire Blaster
Right Click - Fire Missle (Requires Ammo)
ESC/SPACE - Pause Game
